DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine feedback practice affect decision making adolescent attention deficit hyperactivity disorder . Participants choose low certain outcome higher uncertain outcome , without serial feedback trial . Participants perform task twice examine practice effect .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Feedback Practice Probabilistic Decision Making Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder
DOC.criteria: ADHD Current major depression , Psychosis , Autism , Tourette syndrome
